rules.description: Tab to F18/Tab, trigger for Hyperspoon, ehh Hammerspoon
Magicforce68 - swap left-option and -command and add cmd-tilde and cmd-tab to the standalone keys
Apple keyboard - fn + l to Lock-screen, fn + s to Sleep
Keychron K1 - microphone button becomes 'Copy picture of selected area to clipboard'
Change command to cmd+tab, option to cmd+tilde and control to ctrl+tab when pressed `alone`

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "Moi,oet Grunn!" as text'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "Moi,oet Grunn!" as text'

rules.description: Special 'vowel' character - '/' for accent aigu and ';' for umlaut and '\' for grave accent

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "" with title "UI Sound effects off"'
defaults write 'Apple Global Domain' com.apple.sound.uiaudio.enabled -bool false
osascript -e 'display notification "" with title "UI Sound effects on"'
defaults write 'Apple Global Domain' com.apple.sound.uiaudio.enabled -bool true

rules.description: Hyper Mode mousekey movement (left_shift or left_shift + left_control reduce the speed)
Safari: run script to save tabs to markdown (left-option + 'o')

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to make new Finder window'
osascript -e 'display dialog "Hello from Karabiner-elements" with title "This must be Safari!"'

rules.description: Google Chrome: run script to save tabs to markdown (left-option + 'o')
Finder: run script to open selected file or directory in VSCodium (right-option + 'o')
